Description: As a developer, I want to automate the creation of GitHub issues to streamline project management.
As a project manager, I want to manage multiple repositories efficiently to ensure consistency across projects.
As a database administrator, I want to automate regular backups to prevent data loss and ensure business continuity.
As a DevOps engineer, I want to implement continuous integration to enable seamless code deployment and testing.
As a security officer, I want to enforce access control policies to protect sensitive information and comply with regulations.
As a front-end developer, I want to create a responsive design that adapts to various screen sizes for an optimal user experience.
